thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by barry

author: barry
title: barry
text: I ordered some parts for my shower on Monday morning expecting to wait about three to four days, the parts arrived by post the next day ( Tuesday) unfortunately although I ordered two parts the same two different parts arrived, I phoned the company to let them know and they were very helpful and apologetic saying that the parts I actually wanted might now be out of stock and I might have to wait a couple of days for a replacement. I was really surprised when the very next day ( Wednesday ) the new part arrived with a stamp addressed envelope to return the wrongly supplied part. I think this company have taken customer service to a new level and from my experience I would recommend them to anybody, they are also very competitive with their prices I was 100% satisfied all round
